title: UTINI
description: Wait, there's something dead ahead on the scanner. It looks like our droid...hit the accelerator.

title: TATOOINE
description: Two or Three more things and we're in great shape. The sooner the better.

title: JAM THEIR COMLINK
description: Ah, good. New acquisitions. You are a protocol droid, are you not? I am See-Threepio, human-cy... Yes or no will do.

title: REMOVE THE BOLT
description: All troops will debark for ground assault. Prepare to target the main generator.
